message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SE, cs.CY 

This paper discusses the manipulation of decentralized ledgers and proposes design principles to make it more difficult to manipulate and easier to detect violations. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as well as distributed computing (cs.DC) and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also discusses governance and consensus mechanisms, which are relevant to software engineering (cs.SE) and cybersecurity (cs.CY).
